author: smrenna
body: This is a patch to SimpleTimeShower that fixes the bug leading to a bias in the particle multiplicity of jets at high pT.   It is simply the difference between SimpleTimeShower in pythia8.240 and pythia8.243 (so backporting the fix).    It does NOT handle the outstanding issue with color swaps in colored resonance decays.
title: change to 8240 in to handle high multiplicity bug
